title: Did what it said it would do
comment: The config is a little confusing @ first but once I got it sorted out I was pumped. Great app.

title: Not worth paying for, use Contacts InLine
comment: Doesn't sync after the first time, and also can't change account info after setup...can only delete and re-add

title: Makes phone unstable
comment: While it does what it says, it has two major problems for me: First, it's not possible to change the details of an account config
OK at what it does: one-way sync of phone, e-mail, and work address fields. Annoying that acct. settings can't be edited. Some improvement would help.

title: Author Gives No Support and App Does Not Work
comment: Have attempted to contact the developer on many occasions. No answer whatsoever. Upon upgrading to Android 2.2.2 on Droid X2 this app stopped working altogether. It seems to be a permissions problem with Activity Manager but Daniel doesn't seem to care. He took my money, though.

title: initial sync works but ...
comment: * initial sync ldap > phone works fine with OpenLDAP based directory set sldapd.conf: sizelimit -1 to avoid "size limit exceeded" * follow up syncs cause "android.process.acore stopped" error * account settings can't be edited * thus each time I want to sync I have to remove/insert the ldap account
Errors every time. Emailed developer and did not get a response.

title: Only appears to sync in one direction
comment: Easy to configure, connected immediately, but: - Only appears to sync in one direction (server -> phone). What am I doing wrong? - Can't figure out how to edit the account settings after having created it.
Can't group contacts, does not find them via htc desire people app.
Works great with our company's OpenLDAP based directory, including jpegphoto attribute
Doesn't work for me. Error message don't help me. Refund didn't work. Aborts after a while saying "size exceeded".
It attempts to sync but I get an error message of "size limit exceeded." It needs edit settings and size limit increased.
Does what it says on the box. Doesn't allow multiple accounts on the same server, though.
